name: graylog
label: Graylog
description: Graylog is a leading centralized log management solution for capturing, storing, and enabling real-time analysis of terabytes of machine data. This connector facilitates automated operations related to alerts, clusters, events, and search messages.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: Specify the URL of the Graylog server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.name: server_url

fields.title: Username
fields.description: Specify the Username used to access the Graylog server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: username

fields.title: Password
fields.description: Specify the Password used to access the Graylog server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.
fields.name: password

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.
fields.name: verify_ssl

operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves a list of alerts from Graylog.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 300.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 300.

parameters.title: Since
parameters.description: (Optional) Time range based on which you want to retrieve alerts from Graylog. By Default, this value is set as 0.
parameters.name: since
parameters.tooltip: Specify in UNIX timestamp.

operations.title: Search Events
operations.description: Search for a events in Graylog based on the input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Time Range
parameters.description: Time range based on which you want to retrieve events from Graylog. By Default, this value is set as 300.
parameters.name: time_range
parameters.tooltip: Time range based on which you want to retrieve events from Graylog. By Default, this value is set as 300

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a query based on which you want to retrieve events from Graylog.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a query based on which you want to retrieve events from Graylog.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a filter for which you want to filter the events according to the values of certain attributes in Graylog.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the events according to the values of certain attributes in Graylog.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 20.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 20.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say users starting from the 10th user. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say users starting from the 10th user. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the results in ascending from which you want to retrieve events from Graylog.
parameters.name: sort
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the results in ascending from which you want to retrieve events from Graylog.

operations.title: Search Relative
operations.description: Search for a messages in a universal relative timerange from Graylog based on the query, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: Specify a lucene syntax query based on which you want to search for a messages in a relative timerange from Graylog.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify a lucene syntax query based on which you want to search for a messages.

parameters.title: Time Range
parameters.description: (Optional) Time range based on which you want to search for a messages in a relative timerange from Graylog. By Default, this value is set as 300.
parameters.name: time_range
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Time range based on which you want to search for a messages in a relative timerange from Graylog. By Default, this value is set as 300

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a filter for which you want to filter the messages according to the values of certain attributes in Graylog.
parameters.name: filter
parameters.tooltip: (Optional)Specify a filter for which you want to filter the messages according to the values of certain attributes in Graylog.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 20.
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 20.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say users starting from the 10th user. By default, this is set as 0.
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Index of the first item to be returned by this operation. This parameter is useful if you want to get a subset of records, say users starting from the 10th user. By default, this is set as 0.

parameters.title: Fields to Retrieve
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma separated list of fields to retrieve the mentioned attributes only.
parameters.name: fields
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the comma separated list of fields to retrieve the mentioned attributes only.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the results in ascending from which you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.
parameters.name: sort
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the results in ascending from which you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.

parameters.title: Decorate
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to run decorators on search result in Graylog.
parameters.name: decorate
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to run decorators on search result in Graylog.

operations.title: Search Absolute
operations.description: Search for a messages in a universal absolute timerange from Graylog based on the query, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: Specify a lucene syntax query based on which you want to search for a messages in a absolute timerange from Graylog.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: Specify a lucene syntax query based on which you want to search for a messages.

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the starting DateTime from when you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ending DateTime till when you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.

parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 20.

parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the comma separated list of fields to retrieve the mentioned attributes only.

operations.title: Get Clusters
operations.description: Retrieves a list of clusters from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Cluster Node JVM
operations.description: Retrieve a JVM information of the node from Graylog based on the node ID you have specified.

parameters.title: Node ID
parameters.description: ID of the node for which you want to retrieve a JVM details from Graylog.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify ID of the node.

operations.title: Get Cluster Input States
operations.description: Retrieve a input states of the cluster from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Cluster Processing Status
operations.description: Retrieve a processing status of the cluster from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Cluster Metrics
operations.description: Retrieve all metrics of all nodes in the cluster from Graylog.

parameters.title: Metrics
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of metrics based on which you want to retrieve metrics from Graylog.
parameters.name: metrics
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of metrics based on which you want to retrieve metrics from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Cluster Node Metrics
operations.description: Retrieve all metrics for a specific node in the cluster from Graylog.

parameters.title: Node ID
parameters.description: Node ID based on which you want to retrieve the metrics from the Graylog.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Node ID based on which you want to retrieve the metrics from the Graylog.

parameters.title: Metrics
parameters.description: Specify a comma-separated list of metrics based on which you want to retrieve metrics from Graylog.
parameters.name: metrics
parameters.tooltip: Specify a comma-separated list of metrics based on which you want to retrieve metrics from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Cluster Node Metrics Names
operations.description: Retrieve all metrics keys/names from node in the cluster from Graylog.

parameters.title: Node ID
parameters.description: Node ID based on which you want to retrieve the keys/names of metrics from the Graylog.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Node ID based on which you want to retrieve the keys/name of metrics from the Graylog.

operations.title: Get Clusters Lookup Tables
operations.description: Retrieves a list of clusters lookup tables from Graylog.

parameters.title: ID/Name
parameters.description: Specify a ID or name of the cluster based on which you want to retrieve cluster lookup tables from Graylog.
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify a ID or name of the cluster based on which you want to retrieve cluster lookup tables from Graylog.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: Specify a query based on which you want to retrieve cluster lookup tables from Graylog.
parameters.name: key
parameters.tooltip: Specify a query based on which you want to retrieve cluster lookup tables from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Indexer Cluster Health
operations.description: Retrieve a indexer of the cluster health from Graylog.

operations.title: Get Streams
operations.description: Retrieves a list of streams from Graylog.

operations.title: Get System Lookup Tables
operations.description: Retrieves a list of system lookup tables from Graylog.

parameters.title: Filter
parameters.description: Specify a filter for which you want to filter the lookup tables according to the certain attributes in Graylog.
parameters.name: sort
parameters.tooltip: Specify a filter for which you want to filter the lookup tables according to the certain attributes in Graylog.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 50.
parameters.name: per_page
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify the number of results this operation returns, per page, in the response. By Default, this value is set as 50.

parameters.title: Order By
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the results in ascending from which you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.
parameters.name: order
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is selected) to sort the results in ascending from which you want to retrieve messages from Graylog.

parameters.title: Query
parameters.description: (Optional) Specify a query based on which you want to retrieve system lookup tables from Graylog.
parameters.name: query
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Specify a query based on which you want to retrieve system lookup tables from Graylog.

parameters.title: Resolved
parameters.description: (Optional) Select this option (default is not selected) to retrieve the resolve lookup tables from Graylog.
parameters.name: resolve
parameters.tooltip: (Optional) Select this option (default is not selected) to retrieve the resolve lookup tables from Graylog.
